narrative.narrative: Wiggins Airways is a cargo airline based out of Manchester,New Hampshire. It does feeder for both UPS and FedEx and has a fleet of 31 Cessna 208's, 11 Beechcraft 99's, 3 Embraer 110's, a Cessna 402 and a Beechcraft King Air 100 as of 2009. It serves about 30 airports outside of its hub, this includes 8 in New York,6 in Pennsylvania,5 in Maine,4 in Massachusetts, 3 in Connecticut,3 in Vermont,and one each in New Jersey and Rhode Island. It was founded in 1929. It also offers some passenger charter, operates a Fixed Base Operator,has a private terminal at Manchester and does refueling and service for commercial and private planes.

prefereds.aircrafts: Cessna 208B Super Cargomaster,Beechcraft 99,EMB 110 Bandeirante,Beechcraft King Air B200,Beechcraft King Air 90,Cessna 402,Cessna 402C,
